author: Chris Topher <c@creemama.com>
name: utiljs

scripts.package-lock: git clean -fdx && npm install --save-exact && npx lerna exec "npm install --package-lock-only --save-exact" && ./scripts/install.sh
scripts.test: npm run build && npx lerna exec -- mocha

scripts-comments: Lerna may or may not update package-lock.json files. package-lock.json
is not included in bundles posted to npm. Run the script after as the
